caption: Worst experience at a restaurant I have had in a long time. Started out great, staff was upbeat and the atmosphere was good. Then we sat for 25+ minutes waiting for our waiter to return. The couple that came in some time after us was seated and served before my fiance and I,  who I was on a date with to celebrate our engagement, even saw our waiter. Only time we saw him after ol'Stormy dropped off our drinks was on our way up to the front desk. Not only will I never be returning I will be actively recommending people do not go here.
Took us, due to waiting for next course, 3 hours of sitting at the table. No thanks

Food was good although when paying $20 for some chocolate and cheap desserts I would expect better service and to not be rushed. Our server who had long red hair and wore glasses, was obviously rushing us even though we only stayed for less than hour. She asked us if we were “finally ready to pay” in a rude tone after we had more to order the first time she brought the check. I thought it was pretty customary to ask if customers needed anything else before bringing the check in the middle of them eating.

Our experience was so incredible. I called a few days ahead to reserve a table for my wife's birthday. They have adorable options for table decorations for the birthday guest, I went with the Teddy bear and balloon. They even let me come in a few hours early to add more of my own gifts to the table.  We went all out and selected to 4-course meal "Bigger dinner for 2." As inclusive as it is, it was an absolute steal for the price. This included an appetizer cheese fondue, two small salads, chicken, sirloin, filet, shrimp, salmon, and the best of all, Lobster tail! Everything was finished off with a chocolate fondue. For drinks we enjoyed a pitcher of their Sunshine Sangria. It is very summery and kind of reminds you of a beach vacation. I think their red sangria would have been another excellent choice, for our next visit.  It was so fun cooking our selections as we progressed through the night. We had a lovely and attentive server Regan, who made our experience that much better. Thank you Melting Pot! Can't wait to be back!
The food is amazing and there's so much of it. Our waitress was great but their prices have gone up a lot since the last time we came in and it's really over priced now.

I came here for Valentine's day, and it was such an incredible experience. A private booth, delicious food, excellent service, and a wonderfully relaxing atmosphere. I had such a pleasant time. I'll absolutely be returning for other splurge dates. On the pricey side, but well worth it for a treat!

I enjoyed the dim lighting and overall decor. The food was very flavorful and quite filling. They offered a long list of available wines and beers. The wait between courses was longer than I would have liked and the booths are a bit uncomfortable for the hour and half dining experience.
Great experience!

We have been into the melting pot more times then we can count. The food, atmosphere and staff go above and beyond. We had one bad experience (a faulty burner at our table) and the manager/owner were very apologic and accommodating, and made up for our one unsatisfying time. Brooke was our server last night and she was amazing! I will be requesting her every time we go from now on. Drinks were perfect and we left very satisfied. Thank you to the owner Kim and all the staff!
Had an excellent meal and received exceptional service from Clarity!
Delicious food, pleasant, well spaced accommodations, friendly staff. We will return for celebratory occasions.

Great place to eat as a Vegan! They have many options and a great 4 course meal where you don’t feel like they are barely accommodating to what you need. We left stuffed from vegan cheese, chocolate, and broth fondue and couldn’t be happier with the entirety of the meal! We had Brooke as our waitress and she’s an absolute joy to be helped by. It’s of course slightly spendy but you get what you pay for! We will be back for every special occasion. Vegans, don’t be afraid, they have got your back!

We went tonight for my husband's birthday and we were treated very well by the staff. The potato bacon fondue was absolutely incredible and our favorite part of the meal and of course we loved the chocolate! I really wanted to give 5 stars but sticking with 4 because our server never refilled our waters and I had nothing to drink for the last 2 courses and my husband's cheesecake was frozen solid and very hard to eat. Overall good experience and we will be back for that cheese!

I'm a little 5 star heavy in my rankings,  but melting pot is one of my wife and my all time favorites.  You have to do the 4 courses and the wine flight pairing is a food deal.  Traditional swiss is the only way I'll go on the cheese.  Turtle for chocolate, but I'll stray.
Our server Tyler was very wonderful and the food was delicious
Very romantic  amazing  desert

If you are spending $200+ for a 2 person Valentines dinner experience, you have to have some expectation. Everything was fine aside from being rushed. Me and my bf could hear the Manager appraoching various tables, letting them know as nicely as possible that they needed to finish up cause there was another reservation in place for that table. While we were in the middle of our dinner, we got the same talk, and that we can do dessert at the bar or take a 20$ voucher for a later time. We told the waiter that it would be beneficial to let the customers know when they seat about the 2 hour time limit, cause we didn't know.. to which the waiter said the information was on the website (I called directly and asked about the whole valentines deal directly the other week when I was placing my reservation. She never told us about the time constraint). I then asked about our champagne, since we never got it and it was part of the package, he said it was complimentary and doesn't effect the value of the dinner, so we wouldn't get reprieve from the bill for not getting it. He said "if you want, I can bring some right now" so he quickly brought out two glasses as we were getting ready to leave, we slammed the drinks in a hurry, and I paid $235 when all was said and done for this. Needless to say, I won't come back to this place. I get the time crunch, but if you consistently need to push people out than not..then you simply aren't giving people enough time and certainly not their moneys worth. Time management needs recalibrating.
Amazing food, and awesome service from Sam. We'll be back!
Wonderful service, food & atmosphere. We only visit once a year but, love every visit.

It had been about 12 years since our last visit to the Melting Pot in Boise, and I'm sorry we returned.  For the price, this place is extremely overrated.  While our server was friendly, the service and food was not worth anywhere near what we paid. I'm giving this two stars instead of one because I've been to worse. Nonetheless, we won't be back.
Awesome place, with good food. The 3 course Fondue was a delight.

Normally a good time. Our server may need a little training. She was a mix of strange and sincere. One of the cheeses was wrong, but we ate it anyway because she said when we ordered 4 cheese portions, it overwhelmed whoever was preparing it in the back (?) It was also billed as a 5th portion on our check, but we got it corrected before it was incorrectly charged. Will probably be back in the future though. Just wasn’t very fun or appealing last night.

We decided on eating here today and we definitely didn’t regret it! It was a great experience. Our waitress was so helpful and sweet to us. She made ordering so much easier. The prices weren’t bad at all and they also offer military discount! We will be back!
Ally and Ophelia went above and beyond to make sure that my fiancé and I had an amazing night, great personalities, perfect customer service! I recommend this location one hundred percent!

I felt the staff, while friendly, needed to be a bit knowledgeable about the wine list due to the fact they are considered a high end restaurant. Also some of my food was missing and I didn't like that they reach in front of you to turn the table on and off. The food was yummy, but pricy though, and they did have vegan options!

Went here with friends for a double date night. Atmosphere was awesome, service was great, and the food was VERY good. It's not cheap but the combination of the things mentioned above makes it worth it in my opinion.
Veggies were terrible.  The chocolate was watered-down.
The food was excellent as always and the service never disappoints whenever we go.

This was a great experience and one that we checked off our list. Made a reservation and was seated in a quaint "Bell Tower" booth. The drinks and spirits were great. The Quattro cheese was delicious for dipping the  selection of bread brought to us. Lexi was a great waitress and made some great suggestions. We left full and satisfied. Give yourself a couple of hours for a great experience. $$$$$/5 *****/5
Very good.
Was visiting my friend in Idaho and she took me here for her birthday :) it was absolutely amazing! And everyone was so nice :D Kim you and your staff are doing a fantastic job :)
Always a good time when we come to the Melting Pot (we eat here a lot, love the place). Our server, Lexi, was awesome and super friendly. Friendly hostess Makenzie. Can't complain.
Nice place for an intimate lunch
Great service, food, and experience!Highly recommend!
Slow service and meh food. Waitress I guess forgot we were there. Took 30 min for her to even check up on us. We even had to but our own table. Will not be returning.

Wow, well its story time! Took the family here for my daughters 16th bday. I've had fondue before and really enjoyed the experience.  My daughter was really looking forward to it as she hasn't had it before.  Long story short. Our server was SLOW! Like 30 min in between checking on us slow. Between courses she would just be gone. We had to bust our own table, bring our check to the front to pay. It was unbelievable.  3 hours and an hour of that was just sitting there waiting for water or our server to remember she had our table.  The water boy, sounded like he was high and bored AF.  Food was meh. Tiny peices,  like scraps unlike other fondue restaurants that have nice sized cuts. These were one bite peices. Everything was just meh to about to fall asleep waiting for service.  For the $225 meal price tag I expect at least as good of service I'd get at IHOP.  I will NOT ever darken the doors of the Melting Pot again. If I hear of anyone I know who wants to go there I shall tell them to go to any of the hundreds of other restaurants in Boise.  Thanks for reading and remember... don't fondue,  fondon't!
Fun times had by all! Great food for the set New Years Eve specials. Great service with staff that not only acted but dressed the part. We will be back time and time again.

Great service! I was a life disappointed that they did not mix the ingredients in front of you as traditional, but rules changed given the current pandemic. It was easy to reserve and fun to be out again.
Melting Pot have a great service clean and really good food we recommend it for a family or date.
We went there for our anniversary last night.   The experience was fun, but the food was not good quality.   For what we paid, we could have gotten a much better meal and a bottle of wine elsewhere.
It's a fun experience. You don't get much food. The staff was very nice and the drinks were awesome. Great selection of spirits and non alcoholic beverages as well.
Amazing experience. Staff was wonderful and food was great.
Everything was spectacular! Service was top notch and everyone was so polite  Food was delicious and dessert was even better
Amazing food decor and environment.
Great food. Awesome service!
First time there, it was an interesting experience. Hunter our waiter was prompt and good at doing his job. He even laughed at my jokes. Overall it was a good time.
If you haven't been I suggest going. Pretty fun place to take a date out on
Ali was awesome! 10/10 recommend to anyone!
Great fun family experience! Everyone gets to cook and dip and enjoy great memories and conversations at the table.
I love that place me and my husband goes a lot to night was are kids friends bday.
Terrible service, had empty drinks throughout the night. Took 4 hrs to get through dinner due to the horribly slow service. Won’t be coming back.
This place is always awesome, I never leave hungry.
Wow. Wow. Wow. Wow. Wow.
Really great service and atmosphere. Server was funny and very polite! Would go here more often if I had more money 😁
A great experience I'm from Vegas and they use to have a jalapeño filet mignion wish you guys carried it but other then that amazing
VERY slow
The food was delicious and the add ons they offer online makes for a nice touch to a date night
Fun experience, pricey, dessert is the best!

TERRIBLE! My husband surprised me for our anniversary and bought the “Anniversary Package” which was supposed to be a private booth with a dozen red roses and a bottle of wine. When we arrived, the waitstaff couldn’t find our reservations. After waiting 15 minutes for a table, they realized they had placed our reservation under the wrong name. We were taken to our “private booth” which was a table shoved in a corner. The roses were wilting and looked like they came from the clearance section of Albertsons. Their wine selection is “red” or “white”, a total of 2 different types. They took our picture to commemorate the celebration with an digital camera from 2000. Our appetizers took almost an hour to arrive, as the entire staff was busy chatting in the kitchen. Once the food finally arrived, there was cross contamination because there was only one fondue bowl to cook everything. We spent over $250 on bland food, cringeworthy wine, a blurry picture, and the dining ambiance of a rundown Chili’s. Don’t waste your time or money and ruin a celebration

Cierra and Taylor totally made our night amazing!! We come every year for my birthday and we have never once been let down. They were the absolute sweetest & we hope we brightened their day as much as they did ours!!
It was fantastic! Got the four course meal and loved the cheese fondue and the chocolate fondue. Yum yum yum.

We had the Absolutely the WORST experience tonight. We were there to celebrate my mother’s 81 birthday.  She actually asked why this place was so special and Expensive with service and food so poor. Took over three and a half hours.  After FINALLY getting the first course  we had to wait 10 minutes for our forks and napkins only to discover the cheese was cold.  Drinks were hardly delivered and not filled until we had to ask.  At one point we contacted the manager because it was horrible.  For the next 2.5 hours - he didn’t come back to check on us once. We have been avid customers for many many years but this experience has left us cold .... just like the fondue we were served.  No longer making at the table - bad decision. Fondue is not good.
Amazing food
Loved every aspect of this place. Went for my anniversary. Excellent service and food

We went to this restaurant for our 10 year anniversary. They did such a wonderful job! Our server was a supper fun and polite young man. He made the meal feel like an experience. Would suggest this to anyone looking to spend a little money to have a super fun and novel dinner ❤️
Really great quality.  Nice staff.
Their thursdate night was really great! Flower petals on the tables and heart shaped candles greet you.
We had a great time. Never been before. We were helped by Sierra, and she got us in and out in a flash. Great customer service! Super helpful because the menu is pretty complicated.
Great food, awesome atmosphere, and the service was exceptional. Definitely recommend, but make a reservation first.
Great time, super fun waiter, thank you Forrest for making our birthdays so enjoyable.

We had reservations at 8 thinking that would be plenty of time to be done before they closed and still enjoy ourselves.  Even though they weren't very busy we waited a long time fot drinks and for plates to be cleared.  Each time.  Then they started sweeping and cleaning before our dessert making us feel rushed during our celebration.
Amazing food and service

Delicious spot! One of my Idaho favorites and a must stop for some fun. Dessert is my absolute favorite! Service is okay but the experience makes up for that. Be aware they only serve wine and a few beers, wish they had hard alcohol.
Service was great couldent ask for better staff
Amazing chocolate fondue,  great bartender!

Stinky server, couldn't get drink refills and coffee. no check backs. Hard plastic shards in our raw beef. Mentioned to server that kitchen should be aware, she laughed.  Forgot part of our dessert order so brought us frozen cheesecake and cream puffs, the macaroons never arrived.  Pretty disappointed for 189.00.
Amazing food, service is excellent. Great place to enjoy time with friends and family.

Karen was our waiter! He was super patient and very attentive to all of our needs and requests! He consistently followed up on refills for beverages and additional condiments for our main course and dessert! Karen took the time to  give us our space and to finish our entrees, beverages, and desserts! Thank you Kaden for an awesome experience!!

First time being here..... it was really good but you gotta be ready for a commitment! Throughout the courses of food, it did take some time as well as eating/cooking our entree’s. We did the four course meal where you got a cheese fondue, salad, entree’s and chocolate fondue. All was very good with a good variety for each section. Cheese, salad and chocolate get prepared for you but the entree’s are cooked by you with the method of your choice which takes some time. So it’s all very good yes but be ready to be there anywhere between 2-3 hours if you get the 4 course meal!
Some of the best food and best service, made my one year anniversary one to remember!

Our server, Ali, was absolutely amazing! Made our first time very easy and was really helpful with helping us choose what to eat and explaining all the different things they had. Made our experience 10000 times better. will definitely be coming back to see her again!

Have been here twice. First time was 5 star awesome. Second time was just ok but was a great place for a marriage proposal. Hard to pinpoint if it was because of covid or what. Food wasnt as satisfying and music wasnt relaxing. For the cost, just okay doesnt cut it. We shall see if 3rd try gets a better review.

The melting pot is a wonderful place for a night out. On the pricier end of Boise dining, it's well worth it for a special night out. Sign up for their fondue club and get coupons for free chocolate dipped strawberries and heads up about special events and dining opportunities. The choices are diverse, you'll definitely find something you like; or just go for dessert! The staff are fun and engaging and can make suggestions if you gets stuck in all the choices.
I went on a date there. They where so nice to us and the dining was people empty in the room we where in. This made eating there feel safer.
Great food and experience! A fun way to eat!
Food and drinks were amazing pacing was nice and service was top notch will definitely be returning .
Plz dont eat here🤢
Delicious fondue in quiet, secluded, romantic tables. Great for anniversaries and the like.
Only complaint is that we had to wait a long time in between courses but there was so much food that it might have saved our stomaches to wait longer!!
Only for extra special times because it is so spendy. But,  delicious, fun, and entertaining. Love it! The server we had recently was just the best! You've gotta love it!

Visiting Nampa for the boyfriends grandparents and I looked up to see if there was a Melting Pot nearby and saw they had one in nearby Boise. I was so excited! Since the Covid quarantine we haven't been able to go to our home one (Sacramento) so I called up and they had open reservations so we booked one. We showed up and were seated within 5 minutes and the staff was super friendly! Our server/bartender turned out to be one of the owners and she was super nice as well as her husband. They also own a Melting Pot in Spokane,Washington which any time we stop through there we'll keep in mind to visit. They answered any questions we had and were just nice all around. There was another team member who I can't remember his name but he recommended a couple of chill spots to have a beer in the area which was also helpful. Next time we come to visit we will be making it a point to return here. Food was excellent and tasted fresh! Good size portion for the price as well. The Melting Pot mule is a must!
It was wonderful

Phenomenal experience. We did the complete fondue experience for two and it was perfect in every way. I think since this was our first time visiting, it was the best to get a feel for all they offer. While it was a little pricey, I imagine we have many visits to come as we try different options. We did the Pacific Rim for entree. Ended the meal with the Turtle and S'mores chocolate fondue. Our server Alley was an added treat. She was superb.
Surprisingly filling, every time.
Always a great meal! Our waiters are present but respectful of the intimate atmosphere they are providing. Love going here!
The melting pot in Boise is a great place to take your family. Jake, the general manager, was so generous and offered us water during the heat of the afternoon.  The employees are so kind.
Jake, (the general manager) was really nice and hospital immediately as we went in the door. Me and my group had a great time! Thank you for this experience.
Be prepared to be rolled out the door. So much good food!
Best place for date night!
Very friendly staff. Good quality food!
Great food, fun place
Fondue lovers. Come one come all

Wow, this place is the worst value for the money I have ever experienced. The portions are small, so be prepared to have a burger on the way home. The 30 bucks worth of meat you get arrives as 6 little cubes of 3 kinds of whatever you pick. But if you pick any of the flavored cooking methods, it all tastes the same. They even give you dipping sauces for the meat, which is a clear sign that it's a low cut of meat. It was an experience that I'm glad I don't have to repeat.
Great service and an awesome experience.
Little pricy but good

The food and ambiance were excellent. Our server Jill was phenomenal. The whole night was perfect, until dinner was winding down and we went to use the restrooms. Both the men's and women's were filthy, and made me wonder why I'm paying $150 for dinner to use a gas station bathroom. Ruined the night, and we probably won't be back.
3 course meal starting with melted cheese. Main course of meat and vegetables that you cook fresh. And finishing off with melted chocolate for dessert.
This place was amazing 😍

We went the day after Valentine's Day, we were so excited to try this place. There were 4 of us so we had a table with two burners. We were not greeted by or sever for about 10 minutes after being seated, she then came by and took our drink order, it took about 15-20 minutes to get our drinks. Once we ordered and they brought the cheese out the server has to make each at the table, the first cheese took forever, then the second pot of cheese wasn't melting, we checked the burner and it wasn't on. She said it was unplugged, which is below the table on the wall by the floor, she had us, the guests, go below the table and plug it back in. The cheese chose took over 30 minutes before we could even eat it due to the slow cooking and slow server,i even offered top help stir the cheese pits for her as she was so slow ans we were tired of having the server stand at or table making small talk. We ordered another drink, the salads came, our drinks were still empty. Finally i found another server and asked for our drinks, the manager came over and apologized for the wait, said she is assigning  us a new server and that this round of drinks would be on them. We appreciated this. The new server was very nice and seemed much better than the first. We had now been there 2.5 hours when he brought out the pots for dinner. The food was great once we got it. It then seemed like we never saw our waiter again. He took our dessert order but by this time we had been there 3 hours and we had to get home to relieve the baby sitter. I asked to speak to the manager as we never saw the server again, he apologized for the wait and i said we just want to close out and get the dessert to go. He got us the dessert tip go and gave us $20 gift cards for our next time in. We will never be back after that. We arrived at 7:15pm and left at 1030pm.

Everything was superb from the service of the kind wait staff to the food and the experience. Was the meal I just had worth almost $300 for two people? Not quite. Well the selection of dippable options is almost unending, The quality left something to be desired. For the same price there are steakhouses downtown that I would rather eat at.

It was awesome the staff new all my questions and the service there was pleasant and really cool if you decide to go there I recommend the house salad with raspberry vinaigrette and a side of honey to pour on to it mmmmmyummy to the tummy and for dessert the flamming turtle the ambience puts you in the mood for chocolate really nice
Great food a little on the expensive side
Great place to take the family for special occasions. Kids love cooking their food at the table. And they always look forward to the chocolate dessert. Wait staff is always friendly and helpful.
First time here.  Very good. Would recommend it to anyone. Waiter was extremely helpful and knowledgeable.  We will be going back!
Never visited place
Great celebration dinner. Eric gave us awesome service.
Share this place with the one you love
Not too bad, all about the presentation.   For me, it is a one and done.  Not that I wouldn't go back, just too much cheese for me. (I love cheese, it doesn't love me back).  $$$
The only good thing is the cheese. Do not get meat from this restaurant if you don't know how to cook on a high heat pan with no butter and inadequate lighting.
Looooved this place!!
Very cool fondue place. Excellent atmosphere. Great place for a date or a group.
Amazing

Initially it took forever to be seated and they had plenty of seats open, the server was just average oh, and the food was barely above average. The experience of it was pretty good though for the most part. Expect to spend $80 for a couple at minimum for dinner.
Some of the steak was not very tender. But everything else was excellent.

Atmosphere very pleasant, food good. A little over priced for what you're actually getting, but a good experience. Our waiter made sure to help out with food allergy accommodations which we have many, which made it excellent.

Just a helpful tip for the management/owner operators of this establishment-if your burners are not working properly and not getting up to temperature do not serve people! My wife and I are sicker than we have ever been today!
Good food and service
Fun atmosphere and a different way to eat!!! Such fun!! It was great.
So delicious! It's a great place for a fancy dinner date. Plenty of time to talk.
Really did enjoy our meal, just needed better cleaning, around the heating plate. Our server was fantastic. This restaurant is getting older, and showing its age. Time to do an upgrade.
Fun environment
Very good food and a great experience. It is expensive  but worth it.

This is a truely wonderful dining experience. Be prepared to spend a few hours here. Definitely a great place to take your family too bond talk and laugh. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Will definitely be returning.
Was a two star review epic waiter changed my mind. 5 star service forgot the rest.
Love this place.  Great everytime!
Great food and service, staff is super friendly, got seated pretty fast.
Liked the atmosphere and vibe of the establishment! Courteous service and delicious food. It was definitely a different experience.
Everyone's got to try it once

Great place for groups who are more concerned with the experience of eating out, than with the cost.  Sticker shock for those on a budget. What we got as a group of 7 adults came to $200 (including drinks, NOT including tip), yet I left feeling hungry!  Everybody in my group loved the experience of the fondue, except for me because I was the one who paid for it.

The cheese and chocolate fondue courses are my favorite. The meat course has some high quality meat and seafood, but I end up too full by the time I'm done with all three courses. Excellent service, very romantic atmosphere, and good wine as well. They do not have a full bar, so it's only beer, wine, and pre-mixed cocktails.
Food and service was awesome

This has been my favorite place to go for my birthday for years. This yr. I was so disappointed that I'm not sure I will return. The food is amazing and the idea and potential are fabulous  but to be told the cheese we ordered they didnt have all the ingredients for was a little out of the ordinary.  The bar is no longer a full bar, the tables look like hell and we had to move tables because the heat element kept turning off and the portions were half the size....as is the menu now. When I went to the bathroom, things were broken, walls looked bad and it was dirty. This place use to be the best place but today, it is run down, employees arnt friendly, it needs a facelift and they need to bring the bar back. If I'm going to pay $250 for dinner, I want it to be worth it! I pray a yr. from now that this place is still there but the direction it's going and has been for the last 5 yrs is not good. If you want to make money....make it worth peoples while to go. So disappointed!!!!

I feel like I need to explain my rating. The food and atmosphere were excellent. Unfortunately, our waitress was very lacking.  We were there for 2 and a half hours and only saw her 4 maybe 5 times.  Not only that but she assumed we couldn't afford the meal right away.  This was very upsetting.  We do not look "trashy" and I easily make twice what this meal costs in a single day.  Her snobbishness is what gained her a $17 tip on a $150 bill.  I really hope she sees this because I was fully willing to tip $50.
Always delicious. Expensive, but expected. Great staff.
Great experience every time I go. Great food, great servers, and great atmosphere.

We went in for our first time hoping for a good time and the food was amazing the atmosphere was outstanding and our server Steve gave us the best dining experience we ever had and we will make sure he is our server every time we go thank you so much Steve!
It was my first time here and Steve was my server hands down the best server I’ve ever had he made the whole experience even better and helped us understand the menu and pick the best options for us!
The experience is second to none!!! Its so fun to eat a nice dinner here!

I believe my server's name was Jill? Anyway, she was absolutely wonderful to us. We'd never been in a place like that before and I was a little reluctant because it seemed kinda like a college spot. However, the degree of patience and professionalism that she gave us was something I haven't seen in a long time and she really knew what she was talking about. Would definitely come back. Great customer service is hard to find, but apparently it's right here at The Melting Pot!
Our server Zak was amazing! We had never been before and he made the experience perfect! He laughed with us and was a genuine amazing server!!!! I would definitely recommend the Melting Pot and Zak!
Nice restaurant great for date night private romantic setting

It was a fun experience to watch our waiter make our cheese fondue, then serve us our next course so that we could cook it ourselves. The food was seasoned to perfection and the desserts to choose from were fun and creative. I was able to eat a lot here because I am borderline celiac and they have so many GF options!

Ridiculously over priced for a family birthday celebration, service was extremely slow for mid-afternoon. And the waitress didn't know how to explain the ordering process or the options, she had to keep leaving us to "go find out"!!
Service was outstanding. Thanks Jessica!  The cheese was ok but could have been better.  The main course and dessert were amazing!
Atmosphere classy, service food fun and delicious.
The place has really gone down hill.
Amazing food and service!   You will leave full and thankful for the experience!
Wonderful place for a date night. Do not have something scheduled  for after. This place is designed to take your time and enjoy food in a calm relaxed atmosphere. I prefer 2 hour minimum

An amazing experience. At first I was totally overwhelmed and confused, but our extremely friendly and helpful waitress explained everything for me in a way that was easy to understand. Be prepared to spend a lot of money, but the food and ingredients were the highest quality you could ask for. My only wish is that was more cheese!

Honestly, this might be one of my favorite places in downtown Boise. It is romantic, high end and classy. The food is simple, but amazing and I really enjoy the DIY vibe with cooking your own meats. This place can be Keto friendly (avoid the bread and the chocolate) or indulgent as can be! I would highly recommend upgrading your cooking style to the Mojo like the server usually suggests!
Such a great atmosphere. Wonderful staff and super yummy food.
Great place for a first date. Plenty of time to take it easy and talk to each other. Good environment. And the food is great
Great service 👍😊 great place
Everything was excellent! The food was premium, the services was top notch and friendly. The atmosphere is inviting and setting is romantic. A great place for date night!
One of the best places I've eaten at in Boise. Highly recommend for special occasions and important dinners.  The deserts are the best part but not by much since everything is incredible.

I have to say that I rarely write reviews based completely on my experience with the service, but we just had the best time at the melting pot for my sons birthday and our server, Dallen, was a huge part of that! He was so sweet to my children, very knowledgeable about everything on the menu and very patient with the fact that we had never been there and didn’t know how to order. He knew exactly the right amount of time to be at the table, always had a smile, put a lot of hard work into making our experience good, never rushed us and overall I would just say provided five star service! We have ate at a lot of top restaurants all over the US and Dallen out-served many of those! It was refreshing and we hope that he sticks to it because he’s very good at it! The food was also very good so all in all I have to say we were incredibly impressed with what a great meal we had.
I ate so much food that I went up 3 pant sizes.
Amazing dining experience, my friend and I had never been there, and the waitress walked us through our options. Delicious food, and great atmosphere!
It's going to be a long night for dinner, but well worth the atmosphere and cuisine.

Nice options, broth instead of oil for a healthier meal.  It's in the old fire station and that makes for a great interior.  Its quiet and they have a small, semiprivate room for 2.  My only issue is that it's just too much food.

Just celebrated my daughters birthday there today, being our first time visiting the melting pot, it totally impressed us in all aspects. Top notch service with one of a kind food in a decent ambience... we had a great 2.5 hour there... forgot to note down the waitress’s name m, but she was absolutely friendly and attentive, my both kids had ton of fun, and kept asking when we will be returning...
Very entertaining experience, food was delicious!
The Melting  pot  is my favorite! Its where  we celebrate!
Food was good and staff was to
Fun place yummie food

I didn't actually visit this place but it popped up in my places so I must have walked by it, saw the menu drooled then looked at the prices and walk down the street and grab the pizza. anyways five stars... if I was rich

Came here with 7 people on 8/7/2019, we didn’t get drinks till 30min in, 1st course arrived after being here an hour. After 2hrs we hadn’t gotten the 2nd out of 4 courses yet. Asked for the manager, took him more than 10min to meet me so I could communicate my frustration. Still had to pay the check after this.  This had not been my experience at all before, I’d been here a dozen times. This was a 5-star review place. Now this experience has possibly ruined my opinion of the place. This was worse than amateur, worse than average McDonalds service.
It's kind of like America!
Excellent experience! Lots of wonderful food! Loved it!

Very expensive for what you get..... each person $42 +!!!!!   And we left still a little hungry.  First time and will be the last considering other options for that much money.   Also we were disappointed not only about the portion served but the website pics look nothing like what  we were served/saw.
Great food
Good variety. Worth the money.
Love fondue
had a hair in my salad and throughout my dinner i lost my appetite. The only good thing i can say is the dessert, not sure if I'll ever come back I'll have to think about it
Hubby took me here for my birthday and it was a wonderful treat

It's hard to complain about the Melting Pot. The dessert options the perfect way to end a night out in Downtown Boise. Chocolate, peanut butter, and Oreo covered marshmallows - what more could you need?!

Jessica is an absolutely amazing serve.  The food is next level.  One must make time to check out the Melting Pot. Really five stars doesn't cut it for that place. For sure a ten star restaurant and staff.
Took my husband there to surprise him for his birthday. He loved it. Semi-lit alcoves for two. Takes a couple of hours and is as much an experience as it is great food.
Birthday celebration was awsome. Our server who was in training did a great job. Loved the while experience
Service was outstanding.  Food was delicious.  Worth every dollar spent.
Such a great place. Service and food is fabulous!

Overpriced but fun to do once in a blue moon.  Seems portions are smaller and prices higher.  Not as private seating as I've experienced in the past.  Meh.  May go again, won't miss it if not.  If you've never gone it's fun food, but ask for private booth if celebrating anniversary etc.  Be prepared for sticker shock when you're done!! Lol
Fun experience

While the restaurant is fabulous, we got kicked out. Not for anything gregariously bad.... just an over zealous wait staff who didn't like my Rock Star friend sing for the Hostess.. it was funny and the middle of the afternoon.  No harm no foul.
Amazing food and experience!!
Fun and romantic atmosphere! Great food!
Great service and food was delicious.
Little spendy but nice experience. Better if you like cheese

This is our absolute favorite place to eat. We come here 2-4 times a month depending on our schedule. The staff is always very friendly and the food is always excellent. When we were here last weekend, we were able to try FRESH, WARM pretzel bread. We had no idea they made their own bread, but our waitress informed us they do and let us try some fresh bread when we asked for some more with our cheese. We always do the 4 course meal and ask for two portions of cheese, share our salad, share our meat, and share our dessert. It's the best way to do it because you save money and you probably won't be able to eat two portions of everything otherwise (we tried once and didn't even touch half of our meat).

Unfriendly service, dirty dishes, and tiny portions of boiled meat for a price that you could get a bone in ribeye with lobster somewhere else. The fine dining experience is there, but fine dining is not.

Went there to celebrate a milestone birthday.  Made them aware of it when we made reservations and when we arrived.  The birthday wasn't mentioned at all.  I would think for the amount we spent they could have done at least something.  Won't be back.

We made a reservation and got right in. The down side is I feel like the portions have gotten smaller. We like to have the cheese fondue with our main course as well and used to have plenty left over from our veggies and bread, but this time we didn't have enough to get through that.  We had to pay for an extra serving which for the cost I think they could have accommodated the request. We had to ask a different server for water because ours forgot to check back on us. The food is delicious and the atmosphere  is nice, but it is getting a little dusty. The bathrooms are run down and could use some attention as well.
Another amazing night at the Melting Pot! Loved JayJay, he took exceptional care of us. Love you guys! 😍😍😍😍
Great staff, great food

This was supposed to be a special occasion for my mom’s birthday, we were very excited to go here. Everything was fine until the waiter came out to see what we wanted to order. He was talking for a minute and said,”excuse me for a second”, and burped. He leaned back to us and said again “Sorry, I just drank a lot of soda. If you think this is bad wait till you hear about what happened after. He continued to talk about what we wanted, but we only had one burner and my mom’s partner is a vegetarian. We didn’t want to mix the food together so he suggested that we take away her entree so she would get a salad, fondue, and desert. We asked if we could move to a table with two burners instead, but he said “ it would throw off our scheduling”. This was truly unacceptable and I hope you don’t have this problem as well. I have been to the melting pot before and it was great. Make sure if you are vegetarian with others that are not, to get a table with two burners or you’re out of luck.

We got the 4-course (classic and steak lovers; cooking style coq au vin). We enjoyed everything  especially the dessert. My son has nut allergies so we chose the smores and we all enjoyed it (it was not too sweet) The staff who helped prepare the cheese fondue, entree, and chocolate fondue was very nice.
Honestly not impressed. Service was slow and sub par. The drinks were weak. And the cords for burners we're directly where my feet were causing me to sit sideways.

I took my fiancé out for a surprise Birthday dinner. We both were very impressed by the quality of service. The food was amazing! Being this was our first time we had no idea how the menu worked.  Our server Darcy took the time to make sure my fiancé’s Birthday was one to remember. She was very personable, listened well to our request, and made the experience worth coming back to enjoy again!

This is one of my favorites in Boise. I  like to take my son here for his birthday it is where I prefer to hold birthday parties whenever I am in charge of planning the party. The staff is always friendly and the service is exceptional. I am also very impressed with their attention to detail the quality is always the same you don't have to worry about who is in the kitchen it dosen't effect the quality

My first time there, so not sure what to expect.  It was delicious and a cool experience. Our waiter, Felix, is in his nichè for sure. Very cool. Thank you for your patience and ability to smile thru my husband's inability to remember your name. (David) lol

Very fun unique experience. The food was good, the staff was nice attentive and I left full and satisfied. You have to cook your own entree but you choose the ingredients and cooking method. It was a fun experience cooking and timing everything. the chocolate dessert fondue was an excellent finish.

This is once of my wife and my favorite restaurant. It's actually so much more than just a restaurant; it's an experience. Plan on a couple hours for a full meal. It's a full five course meal and everything takes time. Fondue portion starts off with cheese send breads, then main course is meats, vegetables, etc. Then, of course there's dessert. So yummy!
Good. As always.
The food was excellent and the staff was super friendly
So good, everything is so fresh!
Service was fake, food was good. The establishment is in need of a serious cleaning; from sticky bathroom floors to dust falling from the light fixture above...the comfort level was null.

I feel it was totally overpriced. My wife and I were going to split a meal to cut the price, however the waitress insisted that we had to get 2 servings of cheese. She told us there would not be enough in one serving for two people. There was plenty!  We were there for over two hours! It took our waitress 20 min to come back and get our payment. It was just a terrible experience! We Will never be back.
Always have a good time. Best special occasion restaurant for couples. Food is top notch
JJ was amazing and the food was fantastic! Definitely will be a return customer.
This place is delightful. The atmosphere is very private. Every booth is seperate and you are alone with your group. The food is amazing and overall its a great place.
I absolutely love this place.
Love this place great variety
My friends brought me here for my birthday for the first time.  This place is phenomenal and Eric is a great server!
Great place to take a date or your wife.  Doesnt need to be a special day just visit with each other and have a great time
Great place to go for a special occasion. Staff is amazing and the food is tip top. Spendy but worth it.
Definitely an interesting experience eating here. I loved being engaged in preparing the meals and enjoyed it a lot. I recommend doing this in smaller groups.
The new cook method of a cast iron grill is awesome. Don't forget the flaming turtle at the end!

Staff was friendly, professional, and had great suggestions on what to try. The food was absolutely fantastic, and the atmosphere was exactly perfect for what the place needed; dim lights and smooth jazz in a cozy place that almost feels like home away from home.
A wonderful place for that special dinner!
Outstanding.. I got to watch my fiance play with and eat her food.. Does it get any better?

Nicholas was our server, and I just want to say: SOMEONE GIVE THIS MAN A RAISE. He was a phenomenal server! He was extremely polite and super easy to talk to. He cracked a couple jokes and overall made our experience here so wonderful. We will be back, and when we do come back, we will request him as our server if he’s working. Nicholas, thank you for being so awesome!
Not really impressed. Unnecessarily spend.

This was our first experience here! Great food & great service. Our server Jeremy was awesome. He explained the menu and gave suggestions, was friendly and made sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend.

Disappointed this time around. We hadn't been there in a year or so but the portions were much smaller for each course...and instead of broccoli,  califlour and carrots for the cheese fondue they had these weird tasting baby pickels and cherry tomatoes.  ☹

Great service and a very extensive menu. It can get fairly pricey pretty quickly, even just for two people be prepared to get up to the $100+ territory. Worth every cent for the food, atmosphere and service however. Great place for a fun date night.
Amazing service and wine. We got just the fondue but you can get an entree as well. The cheese was rich, I just wish they gave us more to dip.
One of the best places I've ever eaten at!
This was such a great experience and the food was delicious!! Will be going back for sure !!!
Fun night out and the food is very good.  A bit expensive but fine for every once on a while.
fisrt time loved it
Great place to eat.

Enjoyed a fulfilled evening with close friends as we indulged in some fondue. This was my first experience and I was impressed with the service, environment and food. The ambiance was low key and the soft lighting made a great addition. The food was great!! Would recommend for formal gatherings and romantic dates.
Super good and tons of fun!

This is a perfect date night restaurant. The High prices are for the perfect atmosphere not the food. The food is very good though. Offers a quiet restaurant experience and overall very intimate setting. The servers keep an eye on you but tend to leave you to talk. Always great service. I come here quite often

Great food, excellent experience, lots of choices. Portion sizes are great one four course service fed two without issue.  Service was a bit slow, but they comped our dessert as a result. Highly recommend the four course experience as it seems the best bang for your buck.

This is great for a one-time experience of a lifetime it is a beautiful place for two to four people preferably two people so you and your partner can connect on a deeper level the price is $$$ but it is very  was it for the money I paid $87 fondue meat for meat fondue wine fondue and salad and chocolate fondue that was lit on fire and right in front of me the waiters are pretty nice  great service  this place is great that once in a lifetime experience I would love to go there again but this place is like once in a lifetime experience
Had an amazing experience!!! Megan was so helpful in explaining the Melting Pot Experience and helped make our first time very memorable!!! We will definitely be coming back again!!!
Great place if your a lover of cheese😍 great for dates or just outings with friends.
Sister and I went here for dinner lots of fun!!!
The food and the service was amazing! Definitely plan on going there again.

The melting pot is the place to go for special events, birthdays, holidays etc. They give you the menu and it can be overwhelming at first but they explain it pretty well. First you get a salad which is pretty straight forward, then you get cheese fondue with plenty of things to dip in cheese is made in front of you and tastes delicious! Then you get to cook your meat in multiple ways from grills to wine which is very fun, finally they serve you one of, if not the best desserts I have ever had which is a chocolate fondue with treats like rice crispies and pound cake. Great place to go for special occasions, the food is delicious as well as the dessert. However I would not recommend coming here often because it is expensive (as you would expect from a restaurant of such grandeur) and could make it feel less special. Would definitely recommend for future events!
A little bit expensive but overall an amazing experience and really good food. I highly reccomend. A clean and really fun place to eat.
A little spendy, but a wonderful place to make super special memories with loved ones. And the food is fantastic!
Food spectacular, service was fabulous!
Yummy as always
Great place for a date! My boyfriend and I had a great time here.
Expensive but worth it.
Awesome food.  Grill the food rather than broth. Very spendy but good
They should put the grill at table in a different area from the fondue.  It got really smoky and definitely made our visit much less enjoyable.  I started coughing from the smoke.  Not fun!
Great friendly service. Clean and trendy setting.

Great service and food! I thought I had good fondue before I was introduced to the melting pot boy was I wrong. The melting pot was delicious and we had an amazing server! Pricey but worth it! Dont forget to make reservations!
Such amazing flavors! Slow paced and romantic.
I can honestly say, this is something you go to for the experience.  It gets a bit confusing, but fun.
Delicious food and very quiet and romantic!
Such an experience! Loved the privacy of the booth's. Our service was outstanding! Can't wait to come back!
Great place to reconnect
Wonderful food! Super fun dinner date. But, very expensive due to them being the only fondue in Boise.

Our waiter was fantastic albeit a little loud for the mood setting. We went during the Dine Out week and the selection they provided was amazing and both my husband and I were stuffed but it was worth it. I'd 100% go back just for the Rocky Mountain desert.

This place has gone downhill.  We had to wait 30 min despite having a reservation.  Stood entire time in high heels.  They have very young un-professional staff.  They no longer serve martinis or hard alcohol.  The menu has changed and not for the better. We had the 4 course meal. However you pay 50$!! Each but you only get two servings of main meat. The rest of it you get about 2 or 3 bites each. They used to give you tons of food and have great service. We never got refills and took almost 3 hours to eat. I mean come on!! Also my clothes stunk when I left like fried food. For a hundred dollar dinner on our anniversary,  we could not be more dissatisfied.  I will never be back and I will never recommend this restaurant.  A couple years ago it was great, now your better off saving your money and time

This place was pretty alright. Our server was a little bit on the flustered side, and it seemed like we were forgotten quite a few times, but all in all the food was good, and the experience was fun and worth it.
Nice place. Good and fun way to spend time. Kinda pricy
Delicious and fun experience, only go on special occasion because it's expensive but loved it!!
Great food, private as it gets for a restaurant, great service. But very high prices. Theirs no way it can cost even close to that much for 3 shrimp, 3 pieces of chicken, and 2 pieces of beef.
Loved it. Food was wonderful. Great service. Three hours with our kids without electronics. They were fully entertained. Highly recommend.

I can't give 5 stars because when I called at 6:30 to ask how busy they were and if any tables were available soon, I was told that the ABSOLUTE EARLIEST available table wasnt until 8:30. We were disappointed at the late hour (taking my …
Great place to have a good time with friends, family, attractive, very interactive and very affordable... You won't regret. Great hospitality!

Extremely good food, fantastic fondue. Menu was extremely hard to understand and they didn't help in any way when we asked. Spent almost 3 hours here. Had to get our dessert to go because our schedules didn't allow it. Very slow service.
Very good food, great selection, and a nice selection of wines. Kind of disappointed that they've lost their liquor license but the food is still definitely worth it.
Great place to eat if you've got the $$$ can't remember our server's name but he was on top of things and did really well
Great service!
My husband and I went for our 1 year anniversary. First time for both of us!!! Very good food and service!!!
Fun and fancy dinner for date night or family occasions. Definitely worth the money.
Food and service were excellent! The appetizer cheese fondue is sublime...

We had another amazing experience last night with the melting pot!! Our server said he had only been there a month, but was phenomenal at his craft. Great conversation and the best food anywhere. Expensive but worth every dollar. We will keep going back and telling everyone we know the same thing!!
Plan on at least 2 hours. But it is worth it. Great food and service

Loved this place. Haven't been back in a few months. The menu changed and the "Boise night out" is now "best of Boise" where you don't get to choose your cheese fondue or your dessert. Such a shame. For the price that you pay, I think being able to select your own cheese and dessert isn't unfair and shouldn't be taken away from the customer. Sad day.  Edit: so apparently you can choose your cheese and dessert which makes me happy, but that was not evident on their menu that I saw. I am glad to know that now though.

It's a restaurant that is top of it class it has a very friendly staff and overall for the price you do pay however expensive it baby it is so very worth it and the portions are just the perfect amount that you get full without overeating

Food was fantastic, large variety of foods and how to prepare them, service was great. Service is a little slower than most other places, so you have time to enjoy your food I'm assuming. Pretty pricey but definitely something that everyone should at least try. P.S. The daiquiri was also delicious.
After making a call for reservations have good feeling. Thank you!
Spendy but nice
Always a great experience and great food
Great food. Really nice quite place for a date.
Best place in Boise for a romantic dinner!
Delisoush the food was amazing

Went here for an anniversary dinner on a weeknight. Besides the food being delicious, we loved being tucked away in a semi private booth. The hostess was very kind and attentive, but still gave us privacy to enjoy our meal and time together.
Been many times, but actually recieved a card on my anniversary, dining in of course,

We visited for our Anniversary and were very pleased with the atmosphere and menu. Our waiter was very knowledgeable and explained everything in detail. The food was delicious, and the fondue experience was definitely well worth the cost. …
Excellent service and great food. Highly recommended. I forget our server's name, but he was very personable and funny without being overbearing or rude.
Need to go again and try a different experience. Very friendly service and good meal.

Highly disappointed.  Went in for just dessert on a Monday night with my family for my birthday and got turned away for not having a reservation.  The excuse was that they were understaffed but the restaurant was practically empty.  I work in the food business and am understaffed as well but I don't turn people away because of it.

Walked in on a Monday night for a birthday desert. The restaurant was basically empty and they turned us away for not having a reservation because they were “understaffed” Totally unprofessional way to handle this, very disappointed.

We went here for our anniversary, and we absolutely loved it. They put us on this table nestled in the back. Although it was small, it was perfect for the occasion- we couldn't hear other people chatting and the kitchen noises, just us enjoying our dinner. P.S. this is not a quick event, we probably spent 3 hours doing the whole shebang.
A little over priced but worth experance if you've never been. The food was good and loved the salad.
Loved it. Romantic and private.
Great food and great atmosphere.
MEH

Beautiful food and fun experience!  Enjoyed the Flaming Turtle tonight, delicious!  Highly recommend but be sure to check hours before visiting.  Great date night, also recommend reservations instead of just walking in especially if there are events going on downtown.
Yummy cheesy fodue goodness!
Excellent food and atmosphere! We were well taken care of. It's always a treat to come here!

My wife and I have been going to The Melting Pot for a long time now, since the original owners were there. We go once or twice a year, and whenever there is a special reason (school graduation, wedding anniversary, merit raise at work or promotion, etc.). In the 25+ times I've gone here, it's never been a disappointment. Highly recommend the 'Big Night Out' aka 4-course meal. It features salad, cheese fondue, main course, and dessert, each very delicious. The salad is the only course prepared in the kitchen, the rest you cook at the table in a fondue pot. There are various drinks as well, and I love the selection of wine. With this being located downtown, you can walk off everything you eat, really awesome as a summer evening stroll. They will also send you coupons via email which often times discount the food. Expect to spend quite a bit more than most places, but it's seriously worth it.
Fun night and crazy amount of food.
Food was amazing, go hungry! Service was 5 Star!
Best customer service ever
Always love some fondue especially the cheese and chocolate portions!
Awesome experience!!! Loved the atmosphere and our waiter was very knowledgeable and friendly

Mostly go for the cool atmosphere downtown. The staff is phenomenal and well trained in making the experience fun and special. But the food is over priced. Over $100 for two people.  Only worth it for special occasions.

Need to take your partner out for an anniversary, or even just a swanky night out? This is the place to go! The crazy drinks (no liquor anymore), cheese fondue, salads, main courses, desserts... all AMAZING. You get a private, intimate atmosphere, and the service is amazing as well.  It's expensive, but you definitely get what you pay for!
Awesonne food, spendy-dont be a hurry here-average meal is about 2 hours
Very romantic
Great place
LOVE the Melting Pot!! Great service and wonderful atmosphere.
We had reservations planned ahead and Rochell was our server this evening. She was so helpful, friendly, and efficient.  She made sure our dinner was fantastic!
Very good food and fun!
Fun dining experience with lots of tasty choices. The restaurant itself is setup nice as well.
Such a great meal. I have Celiac autoimmune disorder and they are certified gluten free! I thoroughly enjoyed my anniversary meal!

I took my family here (include my three children) for a celebratory dinner. I made a 7:30 reservation, and we didn’t even get the first food item to our take until 8:25. My kids were losing it. When I inquired about the delay to the manager …

If you don't feel like cooking your own meal don't go here. If you up for a different experience I suggest you give this place a try, I Little more on the spendy side about 30-40$ per person not including drinks, you get appetizer, meal and dessert. And it's all wonderful, portion size a not huge but not small. Again this is a upper scale nice dinner place
Nice place to eat!
Loved the atmosphere, phenomenal waiter, good was amazing!
If you're looking for Fondue this is the place to go!
My first visit was exceptional! Plenty of food, excellent service, and a great atmosphere... I'll definitely go again!
Our once a year visit went great. Food was great and service was awesome like always!
Super wonderful place to go for a birthday dinner! You spend at least an hour, hour and a half here but it's fun and the food is delicious. Especially the filet mignon! And the sangria's are perfect!
Food was questionable even when cooked longer than recommended and atmosphere is definitely not what the price is going to either. Would not recommend.
It's definitely not as good as it used to be. Restrooms were a mess and it took forever to get service.

The server was awesome. Not invasive at all. The food is expensive (over $100 for two of us), but well worth it. The quality of food and flavors are delicious. The server would come by, explain it good, get it going, and leave, which I really appreciate in a dining experience. Or drinks never ran out, and our table was always cleared when we were done. No pushy service, trying to usher us out as quick as possible. This place really is a nice treat.

It was a good experience, great wait staff, really good food but very expensive. For the money I feel like I would probably not go again but the quality of the food was excellent. You do have to get used to the method of how to cook your food which is generally raw pork, steak, chicken or whatnot on a stick. You've been have to put the stick in the pot for 2 to 3 minutes and assure yourself that it is cooked through.
Service was great and I liked the table settings but the food honestly isn't up to what I expected. It's ok to say I've tried it but I wouldn't go back again for the food. It tastes bland and boring.
It's fun, but the ingredients are not exceptionally high quality and it's extremely expensive by Boise standards. It's one of the worst deals for your dollar in town.
Horrible service!!
Delicious and a lot of fun
This is a neat place! Really fun experience and great food. Should try it at least once to see for yourself!
Great food in a great setting, love the ambiance of the old firehouse!
Fun

The Melting Pot never fails to make my wife and I feel special on our big night out. We rarely get to do a date night anymore and the servers there pride themselves on making your night the best it can be. The food is always amazing. The flavors come to life when you pair the fondue cooking style with the variety of sauces offered. You are afforded seemingly endless options of flavor pairings.  The food and the excellent service will have you wanting to come back over and over.

Disappointing Anniversary.  The waiter was not present- mentally or physically.  Was gone for long periods of time throughout. Poured my wine in a glass with lipstick on it. I made it known that I am gluten free and he placed the bread basket in front of me. Brought the wrong cooking style pot in which I had to look up to see if I could even eat it. Didn’t want to send it back because it took SO long to get in the first place. Neither of us liked it. We ended up cooking the food and bringing it home to the kids. He also proceeded to place every sauce I couldn’t have in front of me. Good thing I know what’s GF and what’s not.  Had to pour our own wine, ask the hostess for the seasoning bottle and then returned to her 10min later for to-go boxes because the waiter was MIA. Waited so long that we even took the dessert home.  Even had to turn off our own burner. The “experience” was disappointing all around. The only good thing was the wine. *No- he wasn’t busy. It was a Monday night and the place was empty. The one star is for the wine, the second for the cheese.
Friendly staff. Great experience with fondue! Intimate setting and great couples night out!

Dinner was $160 for two, with a bottle of wine and the tip, however they served four courses over two and a half hours. This gave us time to really enjoy our food and conversation, and time to let our stomachs settle between courses. Our favorite dish was dessert, especially the strawberries in the chocolet toffee fondue. Overall we we're pleased with the service and ambiance despite our booth (a corner booth for two) being a little small. We will definitely go again!

Our service was terrible! The waiter took over 20 minutes to seat us when there was nobody in the building, and then dumped a whole tray of beers on my husband who is an on call nurse. My husband found a hair in his salad, and the cheese dip that we wanted wasn't even available. This is a very expensive meal for such poor service. We left a message for the manager, however, we never even heard back. I don't think we'll be back again.
This is a fun place for date night. A VIP style booth with a romantic atmosphere. The fondue is such a fun experience and quite delicious. Service was excellent! Definitely will be going again!
Interesting little spot. ;)
I had never been here before I went here on date with my fiance. The atmosphere was very nice and the food was very good.

Love this place, especially the Bell Tower, a quiet little romantic room for two, for when you just want to be with your sweetheart. Wether it is your first date or your anniversary. It is a great time,  and great restraunt. 😄
Delicious!
Great food
Mmmmm Dessert
Always yummy
